short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Netflix overlay that displays decks of fact-cards at the right time and right place in the video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Netflix overlay that displays decks of small fact-cards at the right time and right place in the videos.

When decks are available for the movie or show currently playing the icon is not disabled.

No account needed to use the existing decks.

Sign in to create new decks and fact-cards and share them to other users.
